description: Rear roof extension; rear roof extension to outrigger; and installation of three rooflights to the front roof slope
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason:  In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended). | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title(s):  OS Masterplan (ID: BLJT-00869776); Existing plans (Drawing number: 1); Existing section and Elevation (Drawing number: 1); Existing Elevations (Drawing number: 1); Proposed Plans (Drawing number: 4) Revision A; Proposed Section and Elevation (Drawing number: 5) Revision A; Proposed Elevations (Drawing number: 6) Revision A;
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.

| No windows or other openings (other than those shown on the submitted plans) shall be formed in the walls or roof of the building permitted.  The new window shown on the side elevation shall be obscure glazed and fixed shut, unless the openable part of the window is at least 1.7m above the finished floor level of the room it serves.

Reason:  To protect residential amenity, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Development Strategy 2026 (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies 7.4 & 7.6 of the London Plan (2016), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2019). | Notwithstanding the details shown on the approved plans, all external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies 7.4 and 7.6 of the London Plan (2016), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2019).
